title: Exemplar

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will also roleblock your target and attack all their visitors.
- You will attack anyone who targets you at night.
- Your immunities cannot be bypassed by effects that bypass immunities.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who reject your will.

desc:
Post 2804
*The holder of a new beginning... except his will is no one's but his own.*
Roleblock, redirect, detection, and conversion immune
